note.p: Education: Trinity College, Dublin. BA (1862), LLD

Career: Teacher, Board of National Education; Head Master, Central Model Schools, Kilkenny; Mathematics Master, Kingston School (1862-1873); Professor of Higher Mathematics and mathematical physics, Catholic University (1873-1881); Lecturer in Mathematics, University College, Stephen's Green (1881-1891)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1890-1891 vol 49 pp xxiv-xxv signed by G G F G
